text:
Looking at this historical German letter, I can identify the following information:

```json
{
    "letter_title": [null],
    "send_date": ["1932-12-21"],
    "sender_persons": [null],
    "receiver_persons": ["Basler Rheinsschiffahrt-Aktiengesellschaft"]
}
```

The letter is dated "Basel, den 21.Dezember 1932" (Basel, December 21, 1932) and is addressed to "Basler Rheinsschiffahrt-Aktiengesellschaft" (Basel Rhine Shipping Corporation) in Basel at Marktgasse 5. The sender's name is not visible in this portion of the letter, and there is no formal title given to the letter itself.
